statements: SELECT * FROM sales_transactions
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, quantity, sale_amount, transaction_date FROM sales_transactions WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_transactions GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM sales_transactions
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions WHERE product_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, quantity, sale_amount FROM sales_transactions WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, quantity, sale_amount FROM sales_transactions WHERE quantity >= 5 AND transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, quantity, sale_amount, transaction_date FROM sales_transactions WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_transactions GROUP BY transaction_date ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions WHERE quantity_sold >= 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, quantity_sold FROM sales_transactions ORDER BY quantity_sold ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, available_quantity, product_id FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0
SELECT transaction_id, product_name, transaction_date FROM sales_transactions INNER JOIN inventory ON sales_transactions.product_id = inventory.product_id
SELECT product_name, SUM(available_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY product_name
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, sale_amount, transaction_date FROM sales_transactions WHERE sold_quantity > 5;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM triggers WHERE trigger_type = 'before_insert';
SELECT trigger_name, associated_table FROM triggers WHERE trigger_type = 'after_update';
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, sold_quantity, sale_amount FROM sales_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, sale_amount FROM sales_transactions WHERE sold_quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'Shirt%' ORDER BY current_stock ASC;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_type FROM triggers WHERE trigger_type = 'BEFORE INSERT';
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity < 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity, last_updated FROM inventory JOIN product_updates ON inventory.product_id = product_updates.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity, DATE_FORMAT(last_updated, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_last_updated FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions WHERE sale_quantity >= 5 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT product_id, product_name, log_message FROM inventory INNER JOIN inventory_logs ON inventory.product_id = inventory_logs.product_id WHERE inventory.stock_quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM inventory LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50 AND price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions WHERE sale_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY total_price ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory JOIN inventory_updates ON inventory.id = inventory_updates.product_id WHERE updated_quantity > 5 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM triggers WHERE trigger_action = 'update' ORDER BY trigger_name ASC;
